test.name: SecretMMS.TC.017a
test.description: Validate Sender can change/delete the passwords associated with the Recipients Test Category: SHOULD Test Steps: --------------------------------------------------------------- Scenario # 2: 1. Login to the MMS Extra Management portal. 2. Verify the sender's device if the Secret MMS is enabled. 3. Add some passwords in English language to send the SMS to the list of recipients 4. Delete the existing passwords for any of the recipients randomly. 5. Verify that the password is deleted and the recipient can no more receive any secret MMS sent by the sender. ---------------------------------------------------------------
